name: Hustle Kings PS Vita
description:
Hustle your way to the top of the global leader boards in this beautifully chic, yet minimalist pool setting. Control every move with intuitive front and rear touch interface and keep the game moving with quick push notifications. Just be sure to hone your skills and earn cash before entering the bustling online scene, where you can use cross-play to play against PS3™ or PS Vita users.

Using your PlayStation®Vita system's touchscreen and rear touch pad, skillfully position your cue, adjust the angles, add spin and fine-tune the power of each shot. With so many new gameplay techniques, anyone can easily pick up and play Hustle Kings™. But do you have enough skill to progress through the game’s Career Mode?

Stay connected to your opponents when you're on the go with push notifications between turns. Choose from a variety of pool rules, including Eight Ball, Nine Ball and Killer. Pot balls, pull off trickshots and win matches to earn credits, then spend them on new equipment in the Hustle Kings™ Store.

Limited Offer: Purchase this content and get access to both the PS3 and PS Vita versions!
